title: Shiny bindings for bscui — bscui-shiny
text: outputId output variable read width, height Must valid CSS unit (like '100\%', '400px', 'auto') number, coerced string 'px' appended. expr expression generates bscui env environment evaluate expr. quoted expr quoted expression (quote())? useful want save expression variable. shinyId single-element character vector indicating shiny output ID UI modify session Shiny session object UI belongs; usually default value suffice

title: Shiny bindings for bscui — bscui-shiny
text: UI can updated bscuiProxy, using different methods: add_elements: add SVG elements UI remove_elements: remove SVG elements UI order_bscui_elements (=c("front", "back", "forward", "backward")) set_bscui_attributes set attributes UI element (e.g. "d" changing path shape "cx", "cy" changing circle position) set_bscui_element_styles: set style UI elements (e.g. "visibility", "fillOpacity") select_bscui_elements: chose selected elements (replace current selection) click_bscui_element: trigger single double click UI element get_bscui_svg: get displayed svg

title: Build SVG/Shiny custom user interface — bscui
code: bscui(   svg_txt,   ui_elements = NULL,   element_styles = NULL,   show_menu = TRUE,   menu_width = "20px",   zoom_min = 0.5,   zoom_max = 20,   zoom_step = 1.1,   clip = FALSE,   default_png_scale = 1,   selection_color = "orange",   selection_opacity = 0.5,   hover_color = list(button = "yellow", selectable = "cyan"),   hover_opacity = 0.5,   structure_shapes = c("rect", "circle", "ellipse", "line", "polyline", "polygon",     "path"),   dblclick_timeout = 250,   hover_timeout = 100,   width = NULL,   height = NULL,   elementId = NULL )

title: Build SVG/Shiny custom user interface — bscui
text: svg_txt character svg code ui_elements NULL data frame following columns: id: element identifier ui_type: either "selectable" (several elements can selected), "button" (action triggered click), "none" (ui) title: description element display mouseover event element_styles NULL data frame id column providing element identifier one column per style attribute. Column names correspond style name camel case (e.g., "strokeOpacity"). show_menu TRUE (default) control menu available menu_width css width value zoom_min smallest zoom value zoom_max largest zoom value zoom_step zooming step: larger faster clip true, current zoom 1, viewBox automatically set original state (drawing moved) default_png_scale default value scaling PNG export selection_color color used highlight selection selection_opacity opacity selection highlight hover_color color used highlight hovered element (one "button", one "selectable", one "none") hover_opacity opacity hovered highlight structure_shapes SVG shapes considered concrete drawing ("text" excluded default) dblclick_timeout minimum time 2 independant clicks hover_timeout time update hovered element width, height widget width: must valid CSS unit (like '100\%', '400px', 'auto') number, coerced string 'px' appended. elementId hmtl identifier widget
